name: Ski Alpin 2006
description:
RTL Ski Alpin 2006 is a winter sports game with some RPG elements. It is possible to start a career as a skiing star or as a manager. One of the highlights of the game is that you can also play US ski superstar Bode Miller.

The most important part of the game is the extensive career mode. The player has to to start with an inexperienced but talented skiing amateur. After playing through a number of junior cups it is the aim to develop in a racer able to compete in World cup races. Through some RPG elements it is possible to improve a number of abilities. These improvements can be felt on the track. It is also vital to do the negotiations with sponsors and you can also do some betting against other racers.

The game features 32 tracks on 18 locations, different difficulty levels and over 900 voiced lines of commentary.
altTitles: "Ski Alpin 2006 mit Bode Miller" -- Tag-lined title
